question: I can clearly identify the main problem before attempting to solve it
I break complex problems into smaller manageable parts
I consider multiple solutions before choosing one
I use logical reasoning to analyze problems
I evaluate the effectiveness of my solutions
I remain calm when faced with difficult problems
I identify patterns in problems easily
I ask relevant questions to clarify problems
I apply previous experience to new problems
I test solutions before finalizing them
I adjust my approach when a solution fails
I make decisions based on evidence
I reflect on outcomes to improve future problem solving
